languages.text: "Если мы найдем исправный шаттл... при всем моем почтении к вашей вере, Ханейманн, душевным равновесием машинных духов мы сможем заняться, когда вернемся на борт!"
"With all due respect to your faith, Haneumann, if we find a working shuttle, we will worry about restoring the machine spirits' equilibrium once we're back on board our ship!"
languages.original_text: "Если мы найдем исправный шаттл... при всем моем почтении к вашей вере, Ханейманн, душевным равновесием машинных духов мы сможем заняться, когда вернемся на борт!"

traits.locale_text: "With all due respect to your faith, Haneumann, if we find a working shuttle, we will worry about restoring the machine spirits' equilibrium once we're back on board our ship!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "With all due respect to your faith, Haneumann, if we find a working shuttle, we will worry about restoring the machine spirits' equilibrium once we're back on board our ship!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "With all due respect to your faith, Haneumann, if we find a working shuttle, we will worry about restoring the machine spirits' equilibrium once we're back on board our ship!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "With all due respect to your faith, Haneumann, if we find a working shuttle, we will worry about restoring the machine spirits' equilibrium once we're back on board our ship!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “恕我直言，哈努曼，这种话还是等我们找到能用的穿梭机再说吧。等我们回到船上之后，再去担心机魂的心情吧！”
languages.original_text: "With all due respect to your faith, Haneumann, if we find a working shuttle, we will worry about restoring the machine spirits' equilibrium once we're back on board our ship!"

traits.locale_text: “恕我直言，哈努曼，这种话还是等我们找到能用的穿梭机再说吧。等我们回到船上之后，再去担心机魂的心情吧！”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Con el debido respeto a su fe, Haneumann, si encontramos una lanzadera en condiciones, ¡nos preocuparemos por el equilibrio de los espíritus máquina cuando estemos a bordo de la nave!».
languages.original_text: "With all due respect to your faith, Haneumann, if we find a working shuttle, we will worry about restoring the machine spirits' equilibrium once we're back on board our ship!"

traits.locale_text: «Con el debido respeto a su fe, Haneumann, si encontramos una lanzadera en condiciones, ¡nos preocuparemos por el equilibrio de los espíritus máquina cuando estemos a bordo de la nave!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ハノイマン、君の信仰には敬意を表する。だがもし動くシャトルを見つけたならば、機械精霊の平衡感覚の復旧に関しては、我らの船に戻ったあとに心配することとしよう！」
languages.original_text: "With all due respect to your faith, Haneumann, if we find a working shuttle, we will worry about restoring the machine spirits' equilibrium once we're back on board our ship!"

traits.locale_text: 「ハノイマン、君の信仰には敬意を表する。だがもし動くシャトルを見つけたならば、機械精霊の平衡感覚の復旧に関しては、我らの船に戻ったあとに心配することとしよう！」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Bei allem gebotenen Respekt für Euren Glauben, Haneumann, sollten wir ein funktionierendes Shuttle finden, kümmern wir uns um die Wiederherstellung des Gleichgewichts der Maschinengeister, sobald wir wieder auf unserem Schiff sind!"
languages.original_text: "With all due respect to your faith, Haneumann, if we find a working shuttle, we will worry about restoring the machine spirits' equilibrium once we're back on board our ship!"

traits.locale_text: "Bei allem gebotenen Respekt für Euren Glauben, Haneumann, sollten wir ein funktionierendes Shuttle finden, kümmern wir uns um die Wiederherstellung des Gleichgewichts der Maschinengeister, sobald wir wieder auf unserem Schiff sind!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Sans vouloir manquer de respect à votre foi, Haneumann, si nous trouvons une navette en état de marche, nous commencerons par regagner notre vaisseau avant de nous inquiéter de l'harmonie de ses esprits de la machine ! »
languages.original_text: "With all due respect to your faith, Haneumann, if we find a working shuttle, we will worry about restoring the machine spirits' equilibrium once we're back on board our ship!"

traits.locale_text: « Sans vouloir manquer de respect à votre foi, Haneumann, si nous trouvons une navette en état de marche, nous commencerons par regagner notre vaisseau avant de nous inquiéter de l'harmonie de ses esprits de la machine ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "İnancına saygısızlık etmek istemem Haneumann ama çalışan bir mekik bulabilirsek makine ruhlarını teskin işini gemimize geri döndükten sonra düşünebiliriz!"
languages.original_text: "With all due respect to your faith, Haneumann, if we find a working shuttle, we will worry about restoring the machine spirits' equilibrium once we're back on board our ship!"

traits.locale_text: "İnancına saygısızlık etmek istemem Haneumann ama çalışan bir mekik bulabilirsek, makine ruhları dengeleme işini gemimize geri döndükten sonra düşünebiliriz!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "With all due respect to your faith, Haneumann, if we find a working shuttle, we will worry about restoring the machine spirits' equilibrium once we're back on board our ship!"
